description:
"Live For Things That Matter" - hand written by Chuck Shirock. This is the motto for the non-profit organization, Everything Burns, which was started by Chuck and Pap Shirock. Chuck Shirock wore this shirt in SHIROCK's debut music video, for "New Solution" - (see it here: New Solution Video - YouTube) The shirt is very soft, made by American Apparel. It has the EB motto, "Live For Things That Matter" printed in Chuck's handwriting, with a black bar across the back with "EVERYTHINGBURNS.ORG" written in it. *Unsure about what size you should get? name: "Calm Inside This Storm" - JAPAN AID SHIRT
description:
"Calm Inside The Storm" - Japan Relief & Aid Shirt. 100% of the proceeds from this shirt go towards relief efforts in Japan. Wear this shirt to show your support of the many efforts to rebuild the areas affected by the natural disaster. After the disaster, a song like "Calm Inside The Storm" takes on new meaning...printed on the shirt it says in Japanese: "You Are The Calm Inside This Storm" - lyrics from the song, which was released on the official debut album, Everything Burns. ***** The shirt is very soft, made by American Apparel & it comes in both mens and womens/youth sizes. *Unsure about what size you should get? name: Everything Burns - EB Armband
description:
The "EB" Armband raises money for the non-profit organization Everything Burns - which was started by Chuck and Pap Shirock. Everything Burns Non-Profit Organization, exists to encourage & equip people to "Live For Things That Matter" - to get involved in making a difference in our communities and around the world. This armband states on the inside that Everything Burns is "a movement of people living for more than the ordinary...to live a life of meaning and purpose...to make a difference in our world, instead of letting the trivial define us." "It's been said there's only 2 ways to live: You can either love things and use people, or you can love people and use things. People, they last forever - everything else just burns." Wear this armband as a reminder to "Live For Things That Matter."
__________

Chuck Shirock wore this shirt in SHIROCK's debut music video, for "New Solution" - (see it here: New Solution Video - YouTube) *Everything Burns is a registered 501(c)3 non-profit organization. All donations INCLUDING THE PURCHASE OF THIS ARMBAND are tax deductible and go to charity.
__________

This armband is unisex - ONE SIZE FITS ALL. It is made to be worn on your right arm...but you can really put it anywhere. :)

name: Everything Burns 'EB' Stickers (3 for $3)
description:
Get the official Everything Burns, 'EB' Logo Sticker! The sticker is printed in white, on a clear vinyl sticker...so when you put it on your car, binder or wherever, all you see is the white "EB," and the website. (Imagine those clear Apple Logo stickers that you see on some people's cars.) On the back it has the quote from Chuck Shirock's Dad - which is also printed on the back of SHIROCK's Everything Burns album. It reads: "It's been said there's only 2 ways to live: You can either love things and use people, or you can love people and use things. People, they last forever...everything else just burns." It then says "Live For Things That Matter" in Chuck Shirock's hand writing, which is the EB motto. The sticker dimensions are: 3.25" x 5.25" inches Everything Burns is a registered 501(c)3 non-profit organization.

name: IROCK Fingerless Wool Gloves - UNISEX
description:
These are wool, knit, fingerless gloves. *WE CURRENTLY ONLY HAVE BLACK IN STOCK* (IF YOU WANT THESE WITH THE FINGERS LET US KNOW) (They come in both GREY & BLACK) They are knit in such a way that over time, they get cooler and cooler looking…never really unraveling, just getting better. On the left gloves you have a black swirl design, and on the right glove you have a hand glued & riveted canvas IROCK Tag. These will keep you warm in winter, and always cool looking. Promise. UNISEX The sizes for these are either Small or Large...usually Small for girls (or guys who want them tight) and Large...

The outside pockets are perfect places for mobile phones, pens, PDA’s…whatever you’d like. This NATO Bag can be worn a couple different ways. It can be worn like a normal messenger bag, with the adjustable strap over the shoulder or across the chest. The way we like to wear it is around the waist…like a fashion fanny-pack. It hangs to the back or to the side, and looks amazing! This is a unisex bag.
